<template>
  <el-row>
    <el-col :span="4" :offset="18">

      <el-button v-if="!isLogin" type="primary">登录</el-button>
    </el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "head",
  data() {
    return {
      isLogin: true
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .el-row {
    padding: 5px;
    background-color: #F2F6FC;
  }
</style>
